description:
Explore our enormous collection of stylish icons, themes, wallpapers, and widgets! You’re free to jazz up your phone’s Lock & Home Screens to your taste.


And it's not just about the look. With Themify widgets for Lock & Home screens and StandBy, you can keep the info you need handy, turn your phone into a smart display, and even have a digital pet right on your screen!


COMPLETE MAKEOVER of your device!

Themify gives you a wide range of tools to express yourself. With our app, you're free to customize your phone to your liking. Enjoy state-of-the-art content and unleash your creativity!

Key features:


■ 3-in-1 Themes


Whether you love dark hues or you’re a diehard pastel fan, you can decorate your screen to create a harmonious space! Install a theme that suits your taste, and watch your app icons, widgets, and wallpapers come together seamlessly.


■ Vast Widget Collection
Interactive widgets to track activities that are important to you, e.g., sleep or steps
Widgets with time & calendar, weather, inspiring quotes, or just eye-pleasing pics—add any info right to your Home & Lock Screens
Cute digital pets (remember to feed and bathe them!)
Widgets for StandBy with always-on time, date, or real-time weather
Informative widgets created especially for iPad

■ Theme Maker

If you’d like to add a personal touch to your Home Screen theme, use our Theme Maker. Feel completely free to change whatever you want and create a one-of-a-kind design for your device.


■ 2000+ Icon Packs


For those who are bored with the same standard app icons, we have an array of custom icon packs. You'll surely find content that resonates with your unique taste!


■ Live and Still Wallpapers

Anime, Urban, Animals, Nature, Cars, just to name a few—we have still and live wallpapers for every taste and mood! With Themify, you're entirely free to choose any wallpaper that perfectly suits your vibe.


■ Apple Health Integration 


Sync Themify with the Health app and effortlessly track your daily sleep, steps, and water intake from convenient and stylish widgets. 

UNLIMITED ACCESS MEMBERSHIP SUBSCRIPTION
• You can subscribe to all features within Themify for unlimited access.
• Subscriptions are billed weekly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.

All personal data is protected in accordance with the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy:
https://aiby.mobi/widget/terms/ 
https://aiby.mobi/widget/privacy/

Make your phone look aesthetic with ThemeMe!

Use your Home and Lock Screen to express yourself or take an incredible journey to other worlds. Unleash your creativity with ThemeMe!

Which style do you like best: futuristic cities or breathtaking landscapes? Do you want minimalistic animations or otherworldly vistas? Or maybe you'd like to add a special battery style?

Apply a single style or color to all your Icons, Wallpapers, and Widgets in just one tap, or mix and match different elements to develop your own unique aesthetic.

Support original creations designed especially for our app. Make your phone look even more personalized when you're using or just charging it. The gorgeous ThemeMe gallery is waiting for you!

KEY FEATURES
■ Fully customize your Home and Lock Screen with ThemeMe
■ Use eye-catching Themes that include Icons, Wallpapers, and Widgets
■ Get your very own original Charging Animation
■ Install Icons quickly and easily without using shortcuts
■ We're working hard to bring you new updates all the time

PREMIUM ACCESS
Get unlimited full access to all ThemeMe features. Enjoy endless possibilities for customizing your iPhone. Premium access includes:
- All-in-one themes with custom app icons, wallpapers, and widgets
- Custom-made charging animations
- Weekly updates of new custom content
- No ads
Unlimited access is available as a subscription. Prices may vary depending on your country of residence and may be converted to your local currency.

SUBSCRIPTION TERMS:
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes account upon confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.
- If you decide to cancel auto-renew, please do so at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

If you have any questions or suggestions about how we can improve the app, please don't hesitate to contact us at support@thememe.zendesk.com.

You can read more about our terms and conditions here: https://estudev.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://estudev.com/privacy.html

In addition, we continue to update and release new themes to meet the diverse needs of users.We provide users with the most popular wallpaper resources, so that your phone is always wonderful, real-time updates, a variety of categories, to meet your imagination of wallpaper.

More exciting look forward to your discovery!

Showcase your work and discover inspiration from the world’s best creative community on Behance. 

KEY FEATURES

Inspiration at your fingertips:
• Browse curated projects across 100s of creative fields, including graphic design, photography, illustration, 3D, art, and more.
• Search for inspirational projects by specific tools, color, and more.
• Build moodboards from projects that inspire you

Hire freelancers and get hired: 
• Browse portfolios and hire talent for your freelance projects and pay artists safely and securely on platform
• Edit your availability and let visitors know you’re open to new opportunities, and get paid directly on Behance
• Send and receive private messages and files

Connect with the community: 
• Follow artists and connect with a global network of creatives
• Share your work and get feedback from the community

Search millions of projects across creative fields and industry, including: 
Graphic Design
Photography
Illustration
3D art
UI/UX
Motion Graphics
Architecture
Product Design
Fashion
Advertising
Fine Arts
Crafts
Game Design
Sound Design
and more!

WHAT’S NEW 
We’ve improved features designed to help you get noticed by hirers and find new creative jobs. 
• Edit your availability to let visitors know you’re open to new opportunities
• Create and send proposals to hirers and get paid directly on Behance
• Share images, videos, and files through the Behance inbox
• Connect and verify your social media accounts

Download now to join a thriving community of creatives!

Transform your iPhone into a personal masterpiece with Wallpics, the ultimate destination for stunning live wallpapers, DIY wallpaper creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper sets, and true 4K quality backgrounds. Whether you’re looking to refresh your lockscreen or craft a cohesive home-and-lockscreen theme, Wallpics delivers everything you need to make your device truly yours.

Endless Live Wallpapers & 4K Quality Backgrounds
• Dive into a vast library of dynamic live wallpapers in breathtaking 4K quality—fluid animations that bring motion and depth to your lockscreen and home screen.
• Browse categories from abstract art and nature scenes to futuristic cityscapes, all rendered in ultra-high definition for crisp, vibrant visuals.
• Enjoy smooth playback and perfect compatibility with iOS’s Live Photo lockscreen feature—your screen has never looked this alive.

DIY Wallpaper Studio
• Unleash your creativity with Wallpics’s intuitive wallpaper maker. Mix and match patterns, colors, and textures to design your own custom backgrounds in minutes.
• Add text, overlays, and stickers—or start with our premium templates to craft a signature look.
• Export your creations in both standard and 4K resolutions, ready to set as your lockscreen, home screen, or share with friends.

Charging Animations & Dynamic Effects
• Impress every time you plug in: choose from a gallery of charging animations that light up around your battery icon—so fun, you’ll look forward to low battery!
• From neon pulses and sparkles to liquid fills and energy ripples, our power-on effects are fully customizable and optimized for iOS.

Premium PFP Icons & Matching Wallpaper Sets
• Personalize your social profiles with a curated collection of pfp icons—stylized avatars, minimalist logos, and neon glyphs that pop on any background.
• Coordinate your entire device aesthetic with matching wallpaper bundles—lockscreen and home screen designs that complement each other perfectly.
• Keep your theme cohesive across apps by exporting both backgrounds and pfp icons at once.

Features at a Glance

Live Wallpapers: Animated lockscreen backgrounds & home screen motion

DIY Wallpaper: Custom background studio with templates, text & stickers

Charging Animations: Dynamic power-on effects for every charge

PFP Icons: Profile picture avatars in multiple styles and resolutions

Matching Wallpaper Sets: Coordinated lockscreen + home screen bundles

4K Quality: Ultra-HD backgrounds and exports

Ready to elevate your iPhone experience? Download Wallpics now and unlock a universe of live wallpapers, DIY creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper, and 4K quality backgrounds—tailored just for you!

Experience the world's leading 3D design platform with a free 7-day Go trial! Without a subscription, you can still view 3D projects for free.

Go offers essential 3D design tools, including SketchUp for iPad and SketchUp for Web. Created for design enthusiasts, architects, interior designers, contractors, home remodelers, construction professionals, and set designers, our intuitive tools streamline the creative process, allowing you to effortlessly craft 3D models and visualize concepts. Whether you're planning a home renovation, designing interiors, or creating a detailed architectural model, SketchUp helps bring your visions to life through 3D design.

Go Features:
- Work seamlessly across devices: Create 3D models on your iPad and computer using SketchUp.com.
- Generative AI Designs: Harness the power of AI to create stunning visuals for architectural and home designs. Generate images that inspire your creative process and support your design narrative.
- Room Planner & Space Design: Experiment with different layouts and design options to find the perfect fit for your space. Model your space with designer fixtures and furniture. 
- Real-time, realistic visuals: Create stunning photorealistic visuals by integrating environments and customizable real-world materials. 
- Scan-to-Design: Use our 3D scanning feature to capture real-world spaces, which AI intelligently transforms and organizes into editable 3D models.
- Augmented Reality (AR): Visualize your designs in the real world with our AR capabilities. 
- DWG Compatibility: Import and export DWG files seamlessly, ensuring compatibility with other CAD software.
- Import real-world information: Import images to textures, satellite imagery, 3D terrain, 3D buildings, and location information to power your designs with real-world context. 

Why Go?
- Architects & Contractors: Transform your architectural visions into reality with intuitive 3D modeling tools. Quickly visualize and iterate design concepts and present ideas to clients and stakeholders.
- Interior Designers & Home Remodelers: Visualize your ideas in 3D and AR, ensuring your designs meet expectations. Use AI image generation to inspire additional finishes and layouts.
- Landscape Designer: Plan and visualize outdoor spaces, from planters to parks, with our 3D landscape tools, like real-time shadow studies, geo-locating satellite imagery, and 3D terrain.
- DIYer: Whether you're planning a small remodel or a complete home renovation, SketchUp provides the tools you need to design and execute your projects with confidence.

Without a subscription:
- Switch between perspective and orthographic camera views.
- Control the visibility of parts of your model.
- Adjust the look and feel of your model by controlling Edge and Face styles, Shadows, Hidden Geometry, Section Planes, and Section Cuts.
- Take measurements and get information about edge lengths, the area of faces, the volume of solids, and component and group definitions.
- View models in augmented reality.

IMPORT/EXPORT
-Import: SKP, SKE, SKM, HDR, EXR, PNG, JPG, PDF, DWG, DXF, STL
-Export: Images (PNG), Animations (MP4), SKP, USDz, PDF, DWG, DXF, OBJ, STL, MP4

REQUIREMENTS
Requires iOS 17 or higher with a minimum of 1024Mb of RAM. For additional info, please visit help.sketchup.com. The AR model viewing feature uses ARKit and is compatible with iPhone 6s and newer, iPad Pro, or any 2017 iPad or newer.

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS
Create 3D designs with a free 7-day Go trial. Payment will be charged to your Apple Account on confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before your subscription expiration date. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before your subscription expiration date. Bring your dream space to life with Home Planner, the ultimate app for design and renovation enthusiasts. Featuring advanced tools like 3D modeling with home design AI, a built-in 3D scanner, and precise measure functionality, this house design app is perfect for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Home Planner’s built-in 3D scanner lets you capture your space in seconds. By scanning any room, you can instantly generate accurate dimensions and layouts. The 3D scanner ensures every detail of your space is accounted for, eliminating guesswork and saving you time.

The integrated digital tape measure captures exact dimensions of walls, furniture, and spaces, ensuring every element fits perfectly. Whether you’re measuring for a new sofa or planning a full renovation, Home Planner ensures functional and aesthetic designs.

Combine 3D modeling with the 3D scanner to create highly detailed and accurate designs with our home design AI. Scan your space, then use the house design app’s 3D modeling tools to explore various layouts and decor styles. Home Planner ensures your projects are as precise as they are creative.

House Design App that Customizes Every Detail of Your Space
Personalize your designs with unparalleled flexibility. Experiment with materials, colors, and finishes to craft a space that reflects your style. With 3D modeling and home design AI, you can visualize every change in real-time, while the 3D scanner and measure tools provide the accuracy of your floor plans.

Immersive Visuals with Realistic Renders
Showcase your designs with lifelike renders and detailed visualizations. Home Planner’s 3D modeling features produce stunning results, complete with realistic lighting and textures. Share your designs with clients, collaborators, or friends to get feedback and refine your concepts.

House Design App that Streamlines Your Workflow with Powerful Tools
Home Planner’s comprehensive toolset - including 3D modeling, top-notch home design AI, a 3D scanner, and precise digital measure tape - makes it easy to plan and execute projects efficiently. From scanning a room to generating layouts and creating detailed designs.

Collaborate and Share Your Designs
Share your projects with ease using Home Planner’s collaborative features. Gather feedback and refine your ideas effortlessly. With Home Planner and our home design AI, turning your vision into reality is a collaborative and enjoyable experience.

Unlock Premium Features of Advanced House Design App
Upgrade to premium and explore the full potential of Home Planner:

— Access pre-designed layouts for quick inspiration
— Create unlimited projects for large-scale designs
— Unlock an extensive catalog of decor and furniture items
— Generate high-quality renders and immersive visuals

With Widgy, your home and lock screens become YOUR screens. Create any widget you can imagine to perfectly match your style. Get all the info you need, exactly how you want it, without the clutter.

• Easy Widget Creation •

You don’t need to be a pro designer. Just know what you want, and let your creativity flow. Add an element, pick a data source, throw on some effects, and place it where you want. Repeat until your widget is perfect, then assign it to a slot and drop it on your home screen. Voila!

The Widgy editor is super simple with just two parts: the preview and the layer list. Edit a layer to tweak its appearance and data. The live preview shows exactly how your widget will look, so no more back-and-forth.

• Everything You Need •

Widgy has all the elements and data sources you could ever need, from system info to weather. Display your data as text, charts, or whatever you like.

• No Limits •

Forget templates. With Widgy, everything is 100% customizable. It’s your widget, your way. The only limit is your imagination.

• Easy Sharing & Discovering •

Share your creations with friends or the entire Widgy community in just a few taps. Use a URL, QR code, JSON data, or a file. You can even publish it in the Explore section for everyone to see.

Need inspiration? Check out thousands of widgets in the Explore section, or join the Reddit (r/Widgy) and Discord communities to see what others have created.


NOTE: Widgy optionally integrates with Apple Health. This integration is used to display your data if you select one of those widget types. Permission for Widgy to access this data is controlled through the Apple Health app.

As with Health, all other permissions for Widgy are optional and are there just to show you the data you want to be displayed.

It’s a smart & creative powerhouse that packs a mighty punch, it takes your photos and transforms them into stunning AI home design visuals with a custom reflection of your personal style. Start with a photo and have a fresh plan, a new mood, and the spark to turn vision into reality!

Try different floor finishes that tie everything together, experiment with wall textures, and add decorative accents to your living areas—each option is rendered with lifelike detail. Outside, explore landscape redesigns, patio upgrades, and backyard plans that blend style with function. ·Virtual Home Staging
Furnish empty or unfinished spaces with realistic furniture and decor, transforming them into a stunningly staged image for real estate listings or interior design. Each result gives clear, scalable ideas you can act on.

From cozy nooks to grand dining areas, we’ll help you visualize every corner of your home and tackle each room individually. Swap floor finishes, tweak bathroom layouts, and choose personalized decor touches so each room looks pulled together without the guesswork.

·Flooring & Walls 
Try a variety of colors, textures, tones and materials. Switch up between bold transformations and simple tweaks until you find the perfect look.

·Versatility at Its Best
Explore design concepts for any type of space—interior or exterior. Looking to upgrade your patio for summer barbecues? Planning a full reno? Our app caters to both practical renovations and creative enhancements.
